item.title: Video Podcast Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Video and Video podcast editor 3-5 projects and shorts per week. Looking 15 hrs per week allocated to these edits.

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baGYtJ4K9_Q&ab_channel=Savorfm

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z3r2khTeSps&ab_channel=Savorfm

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Production, Audio Post Production, Podcast
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Production, Audio Post Production, Podcast
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
